Text: Can't get this to work, this is 1 of 2 games I have been unable to use out of about 40 or so. I just get black screen after starting the game via usb loader gx. I am on system ver 4.3e   Any help would be much appreciated (as much as I hate asking for help in the comments)

@zakattack89

when you get a black screen it is time to try different settings for that particular game until it works. to change settings for just the problem game click load settings after selecting the game. try things like a different cIOS, block offset reload, etc. almost always it will eventually work.
